commands.name: dot help
commands.desc: CLI overview of dotfiles commands and keybindings
commands.details: Shows available commands and bindings based on enabled feature flags. Uses fzf if available; use --plain to force text output.

commands.name: dot doctor
commands.details: Checks git repo state, submodules, expected symlinks, required tools, and MOTD timer status (systemd).

commands.name: dot help --plain
commands.details: Forces non-fzf output even if fzf is installed.

commands.name: sshp
commands.details: Pick a host from ~/.ssh/config and connect via ssh.

commands.name: gco
commands.details: Pick a branch or tag and checkout.

commands.name: gshow
commands.details: Pick a commit and show it.

commands.name: gaddp
commands.details: Pick modified files and add to index.

commands.name: gstashp
commands.details: Pick a stash and run: show|apply|pop|drop (e.g. gstashp show).

commands.name: gfixup
commands.details: Pick a commit and create a fixup commit.

commands.name: gcp
commands.details: Pick a commit hash and copy to clipboard.

commands.name: fh
commands.details: Pick a command from shell history via fzf.

commands.name: cdf
commands.details: Pick a directory via fzf and cd into it.

commands.name: ts
commands.details: Pick a tmux session and switch client.

commands.name: tw
commands.details: Pick a tmux window across sessions and focus it.

commands.name: tp
commands.details: Pick a tmux pane across sessions and focus it.

commands.name: jctl
commands.details: Pick a systemd unit and show logs; use 'jctl follow' to tail.

commands.name: jctl follow
commands.details: Pick a systemd unit and follow logs (journalctl -f).

commands.name: dps
commands.details: Pick a container and show its docker ps line.

commands.name: dexec
commands.details: Pick a container and exec into it. Args are passed to the exec (e.g. dexec bash).

commands.name: dlogs
commands.details: Pick a container and view logs; use 'dlogs follow' to tail.

bindings.name: Ctrl+R
bindings.details:
Replaces reverse-i-search when DOTFILES_ENABLE_FZF_HISTORY_BINDINGS is true.
Enter in dot help runs: fh

bindings.name: Ctrl+F
bindings.details:
Overrides forward-char in shells inside tmux.
Enter in dot help runs: tw

bindings.name: Ctrl+G
bindings.details:
Opens navi menu.
Enter in dot help runs: navi

bindings.name: Alt+C
bindings.details:
Jump to a directory selected via fzf.
Enter in dot help runs: cdf
